tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE disposal_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  material_type VARCHAR(50),
  capacity INT,
  address VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE disposal_records (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INTEGER REFERENCES disposal_locations(id),
  material_id INTEGER REFERENCES recyclable_materials(id),
  quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
  disposal_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE disposal_records (
   record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   location_id INT,
   material_id INT,
   disposal_date DATE,
   quantity DECIMAL(10,2)
);
